What version? What mail provider? Same with :

  • Start Windows in safe mode with networking enabled - https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/12376/windows-10-start-your-pc-in-safe-mode
  • Still In Windows safe mode, start Thunderbird in Troubleshoot Mode - https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/troubleshoot-mode-thunderbird

Does problem change? (many users have found antivirus software causing problems)

content: If you are receiving error message that password is wrong, you need to contact your email provider. If the error message is vague, the issue may be an error in your setup.
creator: davidsk

content:
A quando risale l'ultimo backup? Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content: Welke versie van Thunderbird gebruikt u en welk besturingssysteem? Mogelijk moet Thunderbird naar de laatste versie worden bijgewerkt of opnieuw geïnstalleerd middels een download vanaf: https://www.thunderbird.net/nl/thunderbird/all/.
creator: Mozilla-assistent
